title: FS/FT:  Couple of Cobbs, Cy Young portrait, Benders - let's make a deal
author: bounce

posts.post_title: FS/FT:  Couple of Cobbs, Cy Young portrait, Benders - let's make a deal
posts.post_content:
I've listed prices, but I would prefer to trade for similar caliber players.

I'm especially interested in finding:
1) Walter Johnson Portrait
2) Any Red Cobb "uncommon back", especially Old Mill
3) And Walter Johnson Pitching "uncommon back"
4) Christy Mathewson Portrait
5) Basically any other HOFers with "uncommon" or "rare" backs

PM or email to [url]david@davidratliff.com[/url]. "I'll take it" trumps everything just for clarity. Prices are DLVD via PP F&F to keep it simple.


T206 Cobb Green Portrait Piedmont 350/25 PSA 2.5 - $5800 OBO
[img]https://i.imgur.com/Bc04og2l.jpg[/img][img]https://i.imgur.com/Ybn9ZSOl.jpg[/img]

T206 Cobb Red Portrait Polar Bear PSA 3 - $4200 OBO
[img]https://i.imgur.com/aOWE9fsl.jpg[/img][img]https://i.imgur.com/iCvLbkll.jpg[/img]

T206 Young Portrait Sovereign 350 SGC 4 - $3900 OBO
[img]https://i.imgur.com/Oh3SSEil.jpg[/img][img]https://i.imgur.com/qcbd8NCl.jpg[/img]

T206 Bender Portrait Sweet Cap 150/30 PSA 4 - $435 OBO
[img]https://i.imgur.com/do4OwJ3l.jpg[/img][img]https://i.imgur.com/FOEY2WAl.jpg[/img]

T206 Wallace Portrait Piedmont 150/25 SGC 50 - $250 OBO
[img]https://i.imgur.com/x0IZ8YZl.jpg[/img][img]https://i.imgur.com/BfLpQCMl.jpg[/img]

T206 Durham Portrait Piedmont 150/25 PSA 3.5 - $225 OBO
[img]https://i.imgur.com/HVvndgxl.jpg[/img][img]https://i.imgur.com/17G3ikol.jpg[/img]


T206 Bender with Trees Piedmont 350/25 SGC 40 - $OLD
[img]https://i.imgur.com/xt98x3El.jpg[/img][img]https://i.imgur.com/ktlwdHZl.jpg[/img]
Thank you for working out a trade/ cash deal with me. Bill

All good - thanks again Bill
back to the front page - always interested in trades, got one done and would like to consider others - don't be shy

--Rob
